data.details: Throw the container of vegetable curry in the trash.

data.narrative: At 10:09 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), a disgusted look crosses Ava's face. The brief moment of culinary bliss is shattered by the unwanted presence of the fly. She abruptly stands, scrapes the remaining curry back into the container, and walks over to the trash can. With a sigh of resignation, she tosses the entire container into the bin. So much for that late-night snack. The trash can is somewhere in the kitchen.
